title: Foto: Sven Nykvist
creator_credit: Bayley Silleck, Philip Strick and Visual Programme Systems
brief_description: This film explores the life and work of cinematographer, Sven Nykvist. Emphasises his style of lighting and sense of humanity through interviews and film clips from key Bergman and Nykvist productions. Features Liv Ullman and Erland Josephson.
